Today, Gower is looking solid with 6 ft @12s WSW swell and a moderate 15 mph SW wind. Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach are your top picks, both working well throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop with 7 ft @8s WSW swell and fresh 22 mph SSW winds, making it poor across the board. The day after continues the trend with similar poor conditions at 7 ft @9s WSW and 19 mph SSE winds. Best: today.
